description: A JSON format to support searching for collections in the CMR.
title: Query

oneOf.description: Used to specify the value and options to apply when searching against a particular field. 'value' is required.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will be case insensitive and if set to false, the search will be case sensitive. Defaults to true.

___value.description: The value to search for the given field.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.

_88StringCondition.description: String searches can take either a string or an object with a value to search for and options to apply for the search.

_88AttributeGroupCondition.description: Additional attribute group, which is generally a namespace.

_88TagCondition.description: Search against the subfields of tags associated with the collection

___originator_id.description: Originator id of the associated tag.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.

_88AttributeTypeCondition.description: The data type of the attribute being searched against.

_88PatternOption.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.

_88IgnoreCaseOption.description: If set to true, the search will be case insensitive and if set to false, the search will be case sensitive. Defaults to true.

_88DataCenterCondition.description: Search against any of the subfields in the data center hierarchy

___short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the data center.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the data center within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___long_name.description: The full name of the data center.

___url.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) of the data center.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will be case insensitive and if set to false, the search will be case sensitive. Defaults to true.

___level_0.description: Top level classification of data centers.

___any.description: Search against any of the data center subfields (level0, url, etc.) for the provided value.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.

_88QueryCondition.description: Condition used to filter collection search results from the CMR. If multiple properties are provided in a single condition they will be implicitly AND'ed.

oneOf.description: Used to specify the value and options to apply when searching against a particular field. 'value' is required.

___value.description: The value to search for the given field.

$eref.description: String searches can take either a string or an object with a value to search for and options to apply for the search.

___additional_attribute_value.description: Search for additional attributes by an exact value.

$eref.description: Additional attribute name.
The data type of the attribute being searched against.
An attribute value to search against.
Additional attribute group, which is generally a namespace.

oneOf.description: Used to specify the value and options to apply when searching against a particular field. 'value' is required.

___value.description: The value to search for the given field.

$eref.description: String searches can take either a string or an object with a value to search for and options to apply for the search.

oneOf.description: Must contain 4 numbers in the following order: west, south, east, north. West and east represent longitudes (-180 to 180), south and north represent latitudes (-90 to 90).

$eref.description: Specifies a bounding rectangle search.

___or.description: Groups together conditions to return the union of the results.

$eref.description: Condition used to filter collection search results from the CMR. If multiple properties are provided in a single condition they will be implicitly AND'ed.

___additional_attribute_value.description: Search for additional attributes by an exact value.

___or.description: Groups together conditions to return the union of the results.

___archive_center.description: Search for data centers with a type of archive center.

___location_keyword.description: Search against any of the subfields in the UMM location keyword hierarchy

___detailed_location.description: Filter collections by the detailed location subfield within UMM location keywords.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the location keyword within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___any.description: Search against any of the location keyword subfields (category, type, etc.) for the provided value.

oneOf.description: Concept ID searches are always case sensitive

___data_center.description: Search for data centers of any type (archive, distribution, processing, and originating are all searched.)

___additional_attribute_name.description: Search for additional attributes by name and/or group. One of name or group is required.

___updated_since.description: Revisions with revision date later than provided value

___keyword.description: Used for free text search across most search fields. Refer to the section 'Find collections by keyword search' on https://cmr.earthdata.nasa.gov/search/site/search_api_docs.html for a list of all fields searched against. Searches are always case insensitive and treat '?' and '*' as wild-cards.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the science keyword within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___any.description: Search against any of the science keyword subfields (category, term, etc.) for the provided value.

___recurring_end_day.description: An integer representing the day to get collections with a temporal extent over a recurring annual period ending on or before the given day.

___exclude_boundary.description: If set to true, the search will not include the boundary date times. It has no impact on periodic temporal searches. Defaults to false.

___recurring_start_day.description: An integer representing the day to get collections with a temporal extent over a recurring annual period starting on or after the given day.

___instrument.description: Search against any of the subfields in the instrument hierarchy

___short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the instrument used to acquire the data.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the instrument within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___long_name.description: Full name of the instrument used to acquire the data.

___any.description: Search against any of the instrument subfields (category, class, etc.) for the provided value.

___platform.description: Search against any of the subfields in the platform hierarchy

___short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the platform (source) used to acquire the data.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the platform within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___long_name.description: Full name of the platform (source) used to acquire the data.

___series_entity.description: Second level classification under category. These keywords usually (but not always) refer to a series of Earth or space observing satellites.

___any.description: Search against any of the platform subfields (category, series_entity, etc.) for the provided value.

___two_d_coordinate_system_name.description: UMM two dimensional coordinate system name

___and.description: Groups together conditions to return the intersection of the results.

___additional_attribute_range.description: Search for additional attributes by range. One of min_value or max_value are required in addition to name and type.

___max_value.description: Search for values for an additional attribute which are less than the provided value.

___min_value.description: Search for values for an additional attribute which are greater than the provided value.

___exclude_boundary.description: If set to true, the search will not include the boundary values for min and max values. Defaults to false.

___tag.description: Search against the subfields of associated tag.

$eref.description: Search against any of the subfields in the data center hierarchy

___short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the data center.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the data center within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

___long_name.description: The full name of the data center.

___url.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) of the data center.

___level_0.description: Top level classification of data centers.

___any.description: Search against any of the data center subfields (level0, url, etc.) for the provided value.

___archive_center.description: Search for data centers with a type of archive center.

___location_keyword.description: Search against any of the subfields in the UMM location keyword hierarchy

___detailed_location.description: Filter collections by the detailed location subfield within UMM location keywords.

___uuid.description: Unique identifier for the location keyword within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

$eref.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.

oneOf.description: Concept ID searches are always case sensitive
